Summary: My driver has dogs and that fact alone the manager assumed they were also booked and became very rude refused to rent claimed not to bill me and did bill me.  Disingenuous persona. Felt more like a scam.  Will not recommend.

This was very clean and quiet place we were going to stay only 1 day but we ended up staying 3 days staff was very friendly and price was reasonable we will recommend this place to our friends and family and always come back

I reserved a smoking room. When I checked in, the man behind the counter told me that I reserved a non-smoking room. They only have two smoking rooms, but if I wanted to smoke in a room, it was an extra $50. I was told that was refundable. I wanted to find another motel, but they will not under ANY circumstance give you refund. Upon checking out, the woman behind the counter argued with me regarding that deposit. She's told me that I agreed to the extra $50 was not refundable. RELUCTANTLY gave me back the first security deposit ($50 cash). I will sleep in my car before staying there again.
Manager Response: Hi jennifergL6912DE,  Thank you for choosing Best Budget Inn Anaheim. We apologize for any uncertainties that happened during your stay. We have addressed this straight away to our staff and escalated it to the management for immediate action; to ensure that this incident is not repeated again. Weâ€™d like to invite you again at our hotel and experience the improved stay. If you have any further concerns, please share it with us at (714) 527-0105. Your feedback and suggestions are always welcome.  Sincerely, RP - Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This place is very bad with dirty rooms and roaches, they also have roach powder behind all furniture and you can hear rats crawl through the walls  all night. You will end up with no sleep and having the lights on all night They have a shuttle to Disneyland which they got us  there but failed to bring us back so we had to call a cab with no car seat for our baby,  at 11 PM and waited two hours for the shuttle to show in the cold  , called them and they said they did not have a schedule to come back we have signed a list or what time to bring back very upset
Manager Response: Hi Fresnobeachlover, Thank you for the comments. I'm sorry to know that you find the place very bad with dirty rooms and roaches. Please know that I will be addressing these problems with our staff and taking the necessary actions to improve our services. I apologize again for your disappointment and hope you'll give us another chance the next time you're in the area.

Summary: These people will keep your deposit if you check-out one minute late, charge for ice, charge you if you lose a room key etc! The knob is the tub fell off when I twisted it. Raggedy gate in the bathroom covering the window. TV doesn't work...just horrible!
Manager Response: Hi Diamondesiree,  We apologize if our hotel policy didn't meet your standards and know that your comments about it will be shared with the management to take further actions and provide a better guest experience. We'll be happy if you'd give us another chance to show that improvement.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager (RP)

Summary Heading: A good value with simple amenities.
Summary: Clean, good customer service, about five minutes from Knott's, and fifteen from Disney.  Some nice restaurants closes by. CVS for incidentals and snacks is half a block away. Donut shops seemingly on every corner. Gary at the from desk was welcoming and helpful. Clean, simple, affordable for this area.
Room tip: Rooms at the rear are quieter.

Summary: Let's face it,when you're going to Disneyland from open to close every day of your trip, you don't need anything fancy, just a clean safe place to sleep.  This place is just that.  The staff is friendly, and it's a short drive from the park. The rates are more than reasonable.  You're gonna need that money you saved at Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Was a good deal for the money
Summary: Had decent reviews so I stayed there. Was clean and the room was large, but the A/C was too small and the room was hot.No breakfast and bare bones, but good value for the price.Perfect location for Knott's Berry Farm.
